data.title: Booking Agent
data.meta_description: Krista Allen is an American actress and model best known for her unforgettable roles on Days of Our Lives and Baywatch. Gracing the screens for more than 2 decades, she has starred in countless award-winning series and films. In 1994, she made her debut as the lead role in Emmanuelle in Space, going on to star in Liar Liar in 1997. From 1996 to 1999 Allen play Billie Reed in the legendary series Days of Our Lives. Following this, she began her time on Baywatch as Jenna Avid in 2000.
data.text:
Krista Allen is an American actress and model best known for her unforgettable roles on Days of Our Lives and Baywatch. Gracing the screens for more than 2 decades, she has starred in countless award-winning series and films. In 1994, she made her debut as the lead role in Emmanuelle in Space, going on to star in Liar Liar in 1997. From 1996 to 1999 Allen play Billie Reed in the legendary series Days of Our Lives. Following this, she began her time on Baywatch as Jenna Avid in 2000.

An established name in the entertainment industry, the following years saw her appear in several hit shows such as the X-Files, Charmed, CSI, Smallville and Friends. In 2002, she appeared in the film Confessions of a Dangerous Mind. In 2008 Allen was the star of the reality TV series Fast Cars and Superstars: The Gillette Young Guns Celebrity Race. A well-loved figure in the industry, she has continued to be a regular on shows such as The LA Complex, Castle, Modern Family and as the recurring character of Lydia Marlow on the series Significant Mothers.

Most recently, she has appeared in the TV movies The Wrong Mr. Right and The Wrong Stepfather, as well as various other productions yet to be released. Known for her charm and charisma, Allen is also cherished online, with an Instagram following of over 150 thousand. As a favourite of the entertainment industry, she continues to be a sought-after actress.
